array.name: allowance_generic_wallet_how_it_works_points
array.item: Allowance Wallet balance will be automatically used when you pay with Paytm at elligible merchants
In case of insufficient balance in your Allowance wallet, the remainder would be deducted from your Paytm Wallet
While paying your will see the combined balance of your wallets that is available for payment at the merchant

array.name: allowance_generic_wallet_know_more_points
array.item: Easy offline or online payments at specific merchants
Your allowance wallet can hold a maximum of Rs 100000

array.name: allowance_xtrarewards_wallet_how_it_works_points
array.item: Allowance Wallet balance will be automatically used when you pay with Paytm at Indian Oil fuel pumps
In case of insufficient balance in your Allowance wallet, the remainder would be deducted from your Paytm Wallet
While paying your will see the combined balance of your wallets that is available for payment at the fuel pump
In case you have more than 1 Allowance wallet with available balance, the wallet expiring sooner will be prioritised for payment

array.name: allowance_xtrarewards_wallet_know_more_points
array.item: Make payments at Indian Oil fuel pumps
Tax saving of up to 30% on food purchases
Your food wallet can hold a maximum of Rs 100000

While paying your will see the combined balance of your wallets that is available for payment at the merchant

array.name: first_game_wallet_how_it_works_points
array.item: Paytm Firstgames.com bonus will be automatically used when you pay with Paytm at PaytmFirstGames.com
In case of insufficient balance in your FirstGames bonus wallet, the remainder would be deducted from your Paytm Wallet
While paying your will see the combined balance of your wallets that is available for payment at the PaytmFirstGames.com
Bonus amounts are priortised for payment on the basis of expiry

array.name: first_game_wallet_know_more_points
array.item: Paytm First Games Bonus has all the Bonus amount which you get from completing activities like inviting friends & playing exciting fun games on Paytm First Games.
Your bonus wallet can hold a maximum of Rs 100000

array.name: food_wallet_how_it_works_points
array.item: Food Wallet balance will be automatically used when you pay with Paytm at any food merchant
In case of insufficient balance in your food wallet, the remainder would be deducted from your Paytm Wallet
While paying your will see the combined balance of your wallets that is available for payment at the merchant
Selects merchants segregate food and non food items during billing, food wallet balance is applicable only on food items for such merchants
In case you have more than 1 food wallet with available balance, the wallet expiring sooner will be prioritised for payment

array.name: food_wallet_know_more_points
array.item: Make payments for any offline or online food merchant
Tax saving of up to 30% on food purchases
Your food wallet can hold a maximum of Rs 100000

array.name: fuel_wallet_know_more_points

array.name: gift_wallet_how_it_works_points

In case of insufficient balance in your Gift wallet, the remainder would be deducted from your Paytm Wallet
While paying your will see the combined balance of your wallets that is available for payment at the merchant
In case you have more than 1 Gift wallet with available balance, the wallet expiring sooner will be prioritised for payment

array.name: toll_wallet_how_it_works_points
array.item: Your toll wallet needs to maintain a balance of Rs 150
Direct debits from your Paytm Wallet
Incase of insufficient balance in your Paytm Wallet, payment would be deducted from your Toll wallet.

array.name: toll_wallet_know_more_points
array.item: Easy payments at more than 450 toll plazas on national highways
Direct debits from your Paytm Wallet
Your toll wallet needs to maintain a minimum balance to remain active

array.name: travel_wallet_how_it_works_points
array.item: Make payments for movie tickets on Paytm
Your Paytm Travel Loyalty wallet can hold a maximum of Rs 100000
Paytm Travel Loyalty wallet balance is non transferrable and can only be used to book movie tickets on Paytm
